metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, PHP, Python, Bootstrap, Java and XML.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Use the else if statement to specify a new condition if the first condition is False .
content.html: Use the else if statement to specify a new condition if the first condition is False.

content.code_html:
if (condition1)
{
  // block of code to be executed if condition1 is True
} 
else if (condition2) 
{
  // block of code to be executed if the condition1 is false and condition2 is True
} 
else
{
  // block of code to be executed if the condition1 is false and condition2 is False
}

int time = 22;
if (time < 10) 
{
  Console.WriteLine("Good morning.");
} 
else if (time < 20) 
{
  Console.WriteLine("Good day.");
} 
else 
{
  Console.WriteLine("Good evening.");
}
// Outputs "Good evening."

content.text: In the example above, time (22) is greater than 10, so the first condition is False . The next condition, in the else if statement, is also False , so we move on to the else condition since condition1 and condition2 is both False - and print to the screen "Good evening".
content.html: In the example above, time (22) is greater than 10, so the first condition is False. The next condition, in the else if statement, is also False, so we move on to the else condition since condition1 and condition2 is both False - and print to the screen "Good evening".

content.text: However, if the time was 14, our program would print "Good day."
content.html: However, if the time was 14, our program would print "Good day."

content.html: What is the purpose of the else if statement in C#?
